page.title: 02LIFE STYLES - Lydham/More
page.content: Ceilidhs are a popular{entertainment with folk singing and barn dances and often a buffet type supper dance. Travelling theatre groups eg. Pentabus perform in village halls. Bingo is also popular. Entertainment for young people tends to be in pubs rather than in public halls. We have a few punks - young people with studded jackets, tight bleached trousers and spiky coloured hair styles. {Shoes}vary in style with wellingtons and strong boots being the most popular footwear for farm workers in the area. {Cost from{Â£6-Â£15}for man made materials to {Â£20-Â£80}for leather footwear. This summer casual shoes for both sexes made from brightly coloured canvas. Jelly beans - Sandal type shoes made from plastic are popular and cheap at {Â£2-Â£3}a pair.
